headers.value: default-src 'self'; img-src * data: blob:; media-src *; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://apis.google.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; frame-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com https://player.vimeo.com https://drive.google.com https://docs.google.com https://apis.google.com https://accounts.google.com https://www.facebook.com https://web.facebook.com;
